logging.title: Command Logging
logging.desc: Choose how to create text log files for commands

values.name: session
values.title: Full session
values.desc: Create a log file for the entire session. It will include all commands run since the gui was open until it is closed.

values.name: command
values.title: Single command
values.desc: Create a separate log file for each command run.

updater.title: DataTool Updater
updater.desc: Choose whether to automatically update DataTool.

values.name: auto
values.title: Check for updates on startup
values.desc: OWET2 will automatically look for DataTool updates when it is opened and it will download updates if found.

values.name: force
values.title: Force download
values.desc: OWET2 will download the latest version of DataTool and overwrite the previous version.

owpath.title: Overwatch Path
owpath.desc: Set the correct path to your Overwatch folder.
